Banner.Description:
I am an experienced software developer passionately committed to the transformative power of digital transformation and innovative technologies in shaping the business world. I design and develop modern, user-friendly web and mobile solutions to help small and medium-sized businesses create an impressive online presence. My goal is to help you stand out in competition by bringing technology together with your business goals.


I have 10 years of experience in developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I take care to write and refactor clean, reusable, and scalable code with Angular, Flutter, and C#, implementing good practices and development standards.
Banner.Title: Serdar Sevimli
Banner.Subtitle: Software Developer & Digital Solutions Specialist
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 10 years of experience, I've taken on many roles: System Analyst, Backend Developer, and Frontend Developer. I love sharing my knowledge to create new things that help solve problems.
My skills include making system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and implementing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
I also write programs for personal use, hobby, or utility purposes.
Here are some of the technologies I've trained in and worked with (not limited to):

Areas of Expertise:
ðŸ”¹ Web Development: Dynamic, interactive, and accessible interfaces with HTML5, CSS3, Angular, and jQuery.
ðŸ”¹ API & Back-End: Scalable, secure, and high-performance backend systems using RESTful Web APIs.
ðŸ”¹ Mobile App Development: Native and cross-platform applications with Android, iOS, and Flutter (saving time and budget!).
ðŸ”¹ SEO & Digital Marketing: Strategic SEO integration for top search engine rankings.
ðŸ”¹ Project Management: Transparent communication, timely results, and customer-focused approach from start to delivery.

Why Work With Me?
I see technology not just as a tool, but as a lever that triggers your business growth. In every project, I focus on sustainable success by blending the latest trends with customized solutions. The open communication I establish with my clients forms the foundation for smooth project progress.

Call for Collaboration:
Looking for an innovative partner in your digital transformation journey? Whether you want to update your existing project or bring a new idea to life from scratch, we can make a difference together.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Freelancer
Description: Continuous improvements in frontend and backend
Building platforms using Angular, reactive and object-oriented programming paradigms
Working with C# Net Core, Web Api, Entity Framework, Sqlite, Web Applications, Mobile Applications, Flutter
Template designs with SASS, Bootstrap, Materialize, Bulma, etc.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Mobile Application Developer
Description: Programming new functions for existing employee management platform made with Flutter
Refactoring old code. Ensuring compatibility of every dependency with each update including regular Flutter updates

Experience.Jobs.Title: System Analyst
Description: Programming new functions for existing employee management platform made with Angular
Refactoring old code. Ensuring compatibility of every dependency with each update including regular Angular updates

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Gisselle
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Internal management web application built with Angular and Laravel, covering sales, collection, and tracking departments, with comprehensive and complex various functions. Works with integrations including websockets, schedules, laravel jobs, WordPress, Zadarma, LiveConnect, etc.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Emelteciot
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Monitoring application for data querying built with Angular and Laravel. Implemented chart.js library.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Vas Aviation
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Application for tracking fuel supply requests for aircraft. Includes email module, real-time notifications, CSV file processing for data import, price quotes. Developed with Angular and Laravel.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: GlobalJobs
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: E-learning platform developed with WordPress. Fully customized design with plugins developed from scratch. Features customized payment module, virtual classroom, course tracking panel.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: GlobalJobs
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: E-commerce platform for technology products. Developed with WordPress and shipping system implemented for products. Features sales reporting with custom programming.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Agrourbana
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Monitoring application built from scratch, including authentication module, configurable charts, configurable alarms, and user management. Also includes logic for complex reactive forms for parameter configuration.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Tu Super Plan
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Health plans quote with advanced search engine. Plans are shown based on user's age, monthly income, and location. Includes live chat, contact form, notification system via WhatsApp and email, authentication, and information management through admin role.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Proyexiot
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Data monitoring platform built from scratch for water wells, tugboats, and various facilities, including authentication module, configurable charts, configurable alarms, user management, and geographical location with openlayers. Also includes logic for reactive forms for parameter configuration.

OtherProjects.Title: Other Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Hands Game
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Extended rock-paper-scissors game. A personal project developed in Angular, you play randomly against the machine. Includes use of services, interfaces, and components.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Countries Viewer
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Interface consuming a countries API where you can view the list of countries, see details of each country, filter by name and region. It also has a dark mode where you can switch between dark and light themes.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four Card Feature Section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Single page with minimalist design listing 4 features in 4 cards. Uses Angular animations for entry animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Social Proof Section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of page designed from a design made in Figma. Angular was used along with SASS and CSS GRID for development.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: FAQ Accordion Card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Frequently asked questions accordion made in Angular with logic and animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Profile Card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple page design showing a profile card containing a person's basic information.
